import React, {useState} from 'react' import { Navbar, Nav, Container, Row, NavDropdown, Form, FormControl, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function Header() { const [menuOpener, setMenuOpener] = useState("mobile-menu"); function openMobileMenu(){ setMenuOpener("mobile-menu open") } const [overlayOpener, setoverlayOpener] = useState("overlay"); function openOverlay(){ setoverlayOpener("overlay open") } function closeMenu(){ setMenuOpener("mobile-menu") setoverlayOpener("overlay") } return ( <>
